entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:56 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain this evening then to a few flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
